Headline: Update: #72 North Temporary Reroute near North Ave./Elston
ShortDescription: Update: 72 buses temp. rrted WB: North Ave., Elston, Cortland, Ashland, and North Ave.; EB: North Ave. Ashland, Cortland, Clybourn, Sheffield, and North Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near North Ave./Elston, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via North Ave., Elston, Cortland, Ashland, and North Ave.

Eastbound buses will operate via North Ave. Ashland, Cortland, Clybourn, Sheffield, and North Ave.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/Wellington
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Belmont, Laramie, Fullerton, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Belmont, Laramie, Fullerton, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Wellington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
